  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestCase
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Write junit4 unit tests using HBaseTestingUtility.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestHColumnDescriptor
    As of release 2.0.0, this will be removed in HBase 3.0.0 together with HColumnDescriptor.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestHTableDescriptor
    As of release 2.0.0, this will be removed in HBase 3.0.0 together with HTableDescriptor.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.codec.CodecPerformance.LOG
    LOG variable would be made private. since 1.2, remove in 3.0

    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(byte[], byte[], byte[], String, Configuration, boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...)
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use #createLocalHRegion(TableName, byte[], byte[], boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHTU()
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility() instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHTU(Configuration)
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility(Configuration) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, byte[][])
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, TableDescriptor, byte[][])
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String)
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(TableName, int, int, int, KeepDeletedCells) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String, int, int, int, KeepDeletedCells)
    since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(TableName, int, int, int, KeepDeletedCells) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.enableDebug(Class<?>)
    In 2.3.0, will be removed in 4.0.0. Only support changing log level on log4j now as HBase only uses log4j. You should do this by your own as it you know which log framework you are using then set the log level to debug is very easy.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getHBaseAdmin()
    Since 2.0. Will be removed in 3.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.getAdmin() instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getMetaTableDescriptor()
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. Currently for test only. use HBaseTestingUtility.getMetaTableDescriptorBuilder()
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getMetaTableDescriptorBuilder()
    Since 2.3.0. No one should be using this internal. Used in testing only.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.startMiniCluster(boolean)
    since 2.2.0 and will be removed in 4.0.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.startMiniCluster(StartMiniClusterOption) instead.
